Rio collaborated with the [Chestek Lab](https://chestekresearch.engin.umich.edu) led by PhD student Hisham Temmar on their paper "Long-term Intracortical Neural activity and Kinematics (LINK): An intracortical neural dataset for chronic brain-machine interfaces, neuroscience, and machine learning", which was accepted into the 39th Conference of Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS).

You can read it [here](https://openreview.net/forum?id=TAdeh1dLzu)!
